steps.title: Bumble does not offer read receipts.
steps.content: Bumble does not offer read receipts. It is not possible to see if someone has seen your message, nor is it possible for them to see if you have read theirs. Conversations on Hinge also do not include read receipts. Other apps like Tinder and OKCupid allow you to purchase read receipts as an add-on.

steps.title: Bumble Premium also does not include read receipts.
steps.content: Bumble Premium also does not include read receipts. There is no way to add read receipts as a feature in Bumble, even with a Premium subscription.

steps.title: Look for the three dots when another user is typing.
steps.content: Look for the three dots when another user is typing. Bumble may not have read receipts, but you can still see when another user is typing. Whenever you are typing, the other user will see the same three dots that messaging apps like iMessage display. If someone is typing, they likely read the last message.
